text:
I configured apache as service mode...(& default setting in httpd.conf)

I could start apache well, but when I try to shutdown(or restart) the apache...

Apache reports....
C:\APM_HOME\Apache\bin>apache.exe -k shutdown
The Apache2 service is stopping.
Failed to stop the Apache2 service.

And Apache is still alive......

I'm using P3-600 & ram-256 & Korean Language of Windows98 Second Edition...
& Binary Version of Apache 2.0.35(Downloaded from httpd.apache.org)
creator: actno7@hotmail.com

text:
This seems closely related to PR#8362.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 8362 ***
